EditorData.NodeContext: Roaring at the player to catch the chicken.

Text.Value: It's just a cub! Get it back on the field!
Yer an embarrassment - the fat chicken's runnin' rings round ya!
Don't let the bloody thing escape!

EditorData.NodeContext: Owlbeae has tried to run off the field. Annoyed but also scared of the beast. Yelling at the other players to direct it back to the field and to continue the match.
Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

Text.Value: Get it back on the field!
Yer an embarrassment - the chicken's winnin'!
Don't let the bloody thing escape!

EditorData.NodeContext: Chicken has tried to run off the field. Annoyed. Yelling at the other players to direct it back to the field and to continue the match.

Text.Value: FORFEIT! You're meant the chase the chicken, not the other way round!

EditorData.NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

Text.Value: Oi, FOUL! TOO MANY PLAYERS, STOP THE GAME!

EditorData.NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.
EditorData.logicalname: More than 1 player on the field

EditorData.NodeContext: The 'players' have got the ball near the goal. Anticipation of a goal.

Text.Value: Tha's the quickest chicken I've ever seen!

EditorData.NodeContext: Fear but also delight as the owlbear dodges and weaves out of everyone's grasp.

Text.Value: Don't care how pissed off it is, get that owlbear!

EditorData.NodeContext: Yelling to catch the owlbear. But secretly afraid of it.
Hooting with laughter. The owlbear is dodging around the field, swiping at players.

Text.Value: You killed the bloody ball you lunatic! Get over here!

EditorData.NodeContext: Yelling from in the 'stands' at a footie match below.

Text.Value: Hah! It's running circles around ya!
Tha's the quickest chicken I've ever seen!

EditorData.NodeContext: Yelling in delight as the chicken dodges and weaves on the field.
The 'players' have got the ball near the goal. Anticipation of a goal.

Text.Value: It's small but quick on its claws!
Are you drunk?! Chase the bloody thing!

EditorData.NodeContext: Yelling in delight as the chicken dodges and weaves on the field.

Synopsis: This character is commenting on the 'Chicken Chase' match (akin to a commentator at a soccer match). She's yelling out as things happen in the match. The 'ball' is either a chicken, or an owlbear.
